properties.description: Joined data of 3 files and saved in db table

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		Empname as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		DeptId as string,
		LocId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceEmp
source(output(
		DeptId as string,
		Deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceDept
source(output(
		LocId as string,
		Locname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceLoc
sourceEmp, sourceDept, sourceLoc join(sourceEmp@DeptId == sourceDept@DeptId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpdept
JoinEmpdept join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmploc
